name: Grow Rich Technologies, Inc.
description: Operator of an online shopping platform designed to facilitate people to set their own prices on appliances. The company's platform is an e-commerce negotiation website that offers various products directly from a network of certified retailers, enabling users to pay the price they want to pay for the electronics they want to buy.
